word: Cannot you come just now, just as you are, saying, "In my hand no price I bring, simply to Thy cross I cling"? "Wherefore do ye spend money for that which is not bread? and your labor for that which satisfieth not? hearken diligently unto Me, and eat ye that which is good, and let your soul delight itself in fatness. Incline your ear, and come unto Me: hear, and your soul shall live; and I will make an everlasting covenant with you, even the sure mercies of David" [verses 2, 3]. . . .
